War between landlord and tenant over sign on fence escalates to power, water being cut https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/war- Between-landlord-and-tenant-over-sign-on-fence-escalates-to-power-water-being-cut/VB2BBARTEZG3ROLNHKADKRQJ3E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/war- Between-landlord-and-tenant-over-sign-on-fence-escalates-to-power-water-being-cut/VB2BBARTEZG3ROLNHKADKRQJ3E/ Tracy NealThe dispute began over a sign the tenant had posted on her fence.Sun, 15 Sep 2024 02:00:00 +0000 War between a landlord and his tenant over a sign she placed on the property escalated to the point he cut off her water and power. Photo / 123rf
Government celebrates drop in Auckland CBD crime rates, less emergency housing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/pm-christopher-luxon-to-talk-auckland-crime-after-his-police-ride-along/AH47DPZZ75F7XPMOKVIRBD6APE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/pm-christopher-luxon-to-talk-auckland-crime-after-his-police-ride-along/AH47DPZZ75F7XPMOKVIRBD6APE/ Adam PearseThe level of crime, particularly in Auckland, was a major election issue last year. Sun, 15 Sep 2024 03:38:18 +0000 Prime Minister Christopher Luxon and Police Minister Mark Mitchell announce a reduction in crime statistics in the Auckland CBD. Photo / Alex Burton
Kiri Allan crash: Police file on ex-Justice Minister’s offending reveals new information from the night https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiri-allan-crash-police-file-on-ex-justice-ministers-offending-reveals-new-information-from-the-night/XPKE4MDCTRDE5BTWA35OEQKISY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiri-allan-crash-police-file-on-ex-justice-ministers-offending-reveals-new-information-from-the-night/XPKE4MDCTRDE5BTWA35OEQKISY/ Melissa NightingalePhotos, statements and notebook entries have been released under the OIA. Sat, 14 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 New photos of Kiri Allan's car crash and her failed breath screening test have been released under the Official Information Act.
Napier rapist Bruce Hintz starts long jail sentence for abuse of girl he filmed and photographed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/napier-rapist-bruce-hintz-starts-long-jail-sentence-for-abuse-of-girl-he-filmed-and-photographed/FFYBQODICFGUHNBPXZ2YAVLDG4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/napier-rapist-bruce-hintz-starts-long-jail-sentence-for-abuse-of-girl-he-filmed-and-photographed/FFYBQODICFGUHNBPXZ2YAVLDG4/ Ric StevensWoman abused as little girl confronts abuser in court. Sun, 15 Sep 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Bruce Hintz groomed his victim, calling her "princess" and "buttercup". Photo / 123rf
Brace for ‘net zero’ immigration as cycle turns from boom to bust again - Liam Dann https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/liam-dann-brace-for-net-zero-immigration-as-cycle-turns-from-boom-to-bust-again/4OOZCYYDHJFETCANCDIY53X3HQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/liam-dann-brace-for-net-zero-immigration-as-cycle-turns-from-boom-to-bust-again/4OOZCYYDHJFETCANCDIY53X3HQ/ Liam DannOPINION: Longer-term strategy is needed to smooth population - and economic - growth. Sat, 14 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The arrivals rate is now dropping so quickly that the economy won’t know what has hit it by this time next year, writes Liam Dann. Photo / Richard Robinson

Poison plea: DoC manager warns wild dogs threaten trampers and kiwi in wilderness areas https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/poison-plea-doc-manager-warns-wild-dogs-threaten-traampers-and-kiwi-in-wilderness-areas/YXSP4S44EZFNDISNHEFUXM6TGA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/poison-plea-doc-manager-warns-wild-dogs-threaten-traampers-and-kiwi-in-wilderness-areas/YXSP4S44EZFNDISNHEFUXM6TGA/ Hannah BrownFeral dogs are living in remote NZ bush, putting trampers at risk of attacks. Experts explain: Four ways too much screentime is hurting our kids https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/experts-explain-four-ways-too-much-screentime-is-hurting-our-kids/PUNBLXACVJERHENYC4YULVBZXI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/experts-explain-four-ways-too-much-screentime-is-hurting-our-kids/PUNBLXACVJERHENYC4YULVBZXI/ Jamie MortonWe often use screens as 'electronic babysitters' but it comes with a range of risks. Sat, 14 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The average toddler watches screens for up to 1.5 hours each day, while two thirds of 2-to-4-year-olds spend more than two hours in front of screens.
Police investigating after officer involved in two-vehicle crash near Timaru https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-after-officer-involved-in-two-vehicle-crash-near-timaru/APR6RCWDOJAZPI3ECPQRWJE7GI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-after-officer-involved-in-two-vehicle-crash-near-timaru/APR6RCWDOJAZPI3ECPQRWJE7GI/ Enquiries are under way to determine the cause of the crash. Sun, 15 Sep 2024 03:49:29 +0000 “One of the vehicles involved was a police car driven by an officer,” a police spokesperson said. Photo / Bevan Conley
